statements: DELETE FROM PortfolioRebalancing WHERE client_id = 123 AND account_id = 456;

DELETE FROM PortfolioRebalancing WHERE rebalancing_criteria = 'Risk tolerance' AND rebalancing_date = '2021-12-31';

DELETE FROM portfolios WHERE client_id = 100 AND portfolio_value > 50000.00;

DELETE FROM preferences WHERE client_id = 10 AND preference_name = 'Risk Tolerance';
DELETE FROM criteria WHERE name = 'Risk Tolerance';
